sentence.Network_en: A policeman was killed and scores of people were injured in the melee.
sentence.Network_cn: 混战中一名警察被打死，许多人受伤。

sentence.Network_en: There was a scuffle and I lost my hat in the melee.
sentence.Network_cn: 因发生一场斗殴,我的帽子也在混乱中丢失了.

sentence.Network_en: In the melee that followed they trampled their mother a couple of times.
sentence.Network_cn: 三个打在一团,七手八脚的又踩了二强嫂几下.

derivation.yuyuan_name: mid 17th cent.: from French mêlée, from an Old French variant of meslee (see medley)

encyclopedia.content: Melee的流行摇滚音乐有着一份难以抗拒的自在快感，还有一份触动人心的真实感动，Piano Pop新帮主的魅力充分展现在他们入主华纳唱片公司的首张大碟“Devils & Angels”中，尽情地挥洒着当代英式摇滚乐团以钢琴与人声创造动人歌曲的神采，并且找回了许久不见的加州摇滚活力。

entry.def: A melee is a noisy confusing fight between the people in a crowd.

example.ex: A policeman was killed and scores of people were injured in the melee.
example.tran: 混战中一名警察被打死，许多人受伤。

entry.tran: 混乱的情况;无序的局面
entry.def: A melee of things is a large, confusing, disorganized group of them.

example.ex: ...the melee of streets around the waterfront.
example.tran: 滨水区混乱交错的街道

auth_sentence.content: The result, unsurprisingly, is a rhythm-heavy melee.

auth_sentence.content: One creature seemed to be leading the melee.
